Package model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InvestmentModelInterface
    This interface simulates the functionality of stock market and provides users operations to buy stocks, create portfolio and view its compositions.
    InvestmentStrategyInterface
    This interface is a general representation of the various investment strategies that can be executed on a portfolio.
    InvestModelInterfaceNew

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DollarCostAverageStrategy
    This class is an implementation of Dollar Cost Average Strategy which is a A popular long-term passive investment strategy is called dollar cost averaging.
    InvestmentModel
    This is the concrete implementation of interface simulates the functionality of stock market and provides users operations to buy stocks, create portfolio and view its compositions.
    InvestmentModelNew
    This class also represents a new model which extends the old model and implements new operations that follows solid principles.
    Portfolio
    This class is the concrete implementation of the IPortfolio interface.
    Stock
    A single share of the stock represents fractional ownership of the corporation in proportion to the total number of shares.
    Transaction
    This class represents the each transactions of the user while purchasing stock and selling stock.
    WeightsOfPortfolio
    This class is a representation of the weights associated with a particular portfolio.
